Question.Subject: How to repair Internet Explorer 8 ?
Question.Content: Want to repair IE8 that is not working due to spyware. Thanks Cat, it seems the tool has fixed the missing dll file.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Their are lot of freeware tools that you can use, also you can try resetting IE. Here is a good tool that fixed mine.
Try http://torrents.filesbay.net/torrent/501671-internet-explorer-8-repair-fix-tool.html or http://rs391.rapidshare.com/files/370099940/IE8-Repair.msi.torrent
Good Luck!
